question.title: How to access a Swing UI component without its variable name?
question.body:
I wanted to create Buttons by clicking on a Button with following code:

addButton.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
    @Override
    public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
        projects_panel.add(new JButton("Button"));
        revalidate();
        repaint();
    }
});

Now I wanted to change the text of the button with a TextField, but how do I access a specific UI component without knowing their name.

I tried naming the buttons with increasing numbers attached to a string, but this did not work. I also read that Java doesn't have this feature.
